title: Need help identifying some type!
content:
Would anyone know what typeface this would be based off of?

I would appreciate anyone's thoughts :)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Picture 3.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20130316111123/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture%203_19.jpg) | 188.15 KB |
| [Picture 4.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20130316111123/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture%204_6.jpg) | 193.29 KB |
author: acarhuayo

comments.content:
[Garamond 3](http://web.archive.org/web/20130316111123/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/garamond-3/) from Linotype and [American Garamond](http://web.archive.org/web/20130316111123/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/american-garamond/) from Bitstream have very similar letterforms.  
Next time use the 'Type ID Board' not the 'General Discussion'
